subject: Horse Racing
Cruelty to Animals
Breeding of Animals
lead_paragraph: Ernie Paragallo has denied that he starved and neglected his horses; he faces up to two years in prison and $35,000 in fines if found guilty.
snippet: Ernie Paragallo has denied that he starved and neglected his horses; he faces up to two years in prison and $35,000 in fines if found guilty.
